verses.roman:
tabe prabhu tāṅre ājñā kailā gauḍe yāite
"bhakta-gaṇe niṣedhiha ethāke āsite

synonyms: tabe—then; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto him; ājñā kailā—ordered; gauḍe yāite—returning to Bengal; bhakta-gaṇe—the devotees; niṣedhiha—forbid; ethāke āsite—to come to this place.
translation: When he was about to return to Bengal, the Lord told him, "Forbid the devotees of Bengal to come to Jagannātha Purī this year.
